content: I’ve got it!… Joe Romm is a producer of “false news”! Why else would he continually post articles that are so full of false, or partial data? Typical of liberals… when he is confronted with uncomfortable (inconvenient) facts, he calls the messenger names, and tries to deflect attention away. We are on to your ploy Romm… just like far left college students… you will do anything to try and stop opposing points of view! Thank you NY Times, for having the courage to bring the opposing (mainstream) view to your readers!
